Research Highlights
Application of the basic-DMPA model for the smaller size and the higher operational frequency.
Metamaterial-enhanced vibrational absorption spectroscopy for the detection of protein molecules
Broadening the absorption bandwidth of metamaterial absorber by coupling three dipole resonances
Broadband negative refractive index obtained by plasmonic hybridization in metamaterials

Vallet Scholarship

Aug 1, 2015
1 minute read

August 2015 - Nguyen Thi Hien, Pham Thi Trang, 2 Phd students at IMS metagroup together with Nguyen Hoang Tung, who now becomes our reseach staff were awarded to Vallet scholarship, Congratulations.
